alert.note: Alert for Howard (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 17 at 11:53AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...A portion of central Nebraska, including the following county, Howard. * WHEN...Until 300 PM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1151 AM CST, emergency management reported elevated river levels and ice jamming near Lake of the Woods. - Lake of the Woods is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Central Howard County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
